verses.verse: Beholde, how good & ioyfull a thinge it is, brethre to dwell together in vnite. It is like yt precious oyntment vpon the heade, that ranne downe vnto the beerd, eue vnto Aarons beerd, & wete downe to the skyrtes of his clothinge.
Like the dewe of Hermon, which fell vpon the hill of Sion.
For there the LORDE promised his blessynge, and life for euermore.
